channel.title: admin on Yan Wang
channel.description: Recent content in admin on Yan Wang

item.description: About me I am a theoretical physicist in the field of condensed matter physics. Currently, I am working as a postdoc fellow in the physics department and the Institut quantique at Université de Sherbrooke, with Prof. André-Marie Tremblay on the high-temperature superconductors and other quantum materials using both analytical and computational methods for quantum many-body problems. During my Ph.D. studies, I worked on the theory of gap symmetry and structure in iron-based superconductors with advisor Prof.
